message: I have a great deal for you on this amazing product. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $115.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $105 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $105, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm counteroffering at $110.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $107 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit impatient, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm counteroffering at $112.50.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm counteroffering at $115, but I'm getting close to my limit. Let's meet in the middle at $112.75.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $112.5 for the product.
